column4: hey guys im getting "The theme will not look as intended because the required GTK+ theme endinge is not installed"  how do i find out what/where that engine is?
try sudo apt-get install gtk-engines gtk2-engines
Did you install the theme correctly?
I doubt but it could need gtk-qt-engine or gtk2-sharp2
it wasnt gtk-qt but im checking sharp2 right now
neither of those :P lol i may just be doomed here...

But your problem is easy, you should hear what I did yesterday... WIndows install, twice, Fedora install, kernelmod ati drivers then wait until evening to get help to recreate initrd and still not working :)
Lol? Ubuntu is easy to install :)
